title.rendered: The Ultimate Cottage Salad with Turkey

content.rendered: This is the go-to summer recipe we love! Easy-to-make and DELICIOUS, it’s ideal when you just want to relax, enjoy the sun and have a healthy meal. Make it at the cottage, bring to friend’s potluck, or for a backyard picnic. You can always take it to work for lunch, too, and on your break pretend you’re far far away, somewhere by the lake.
